123/**
124 * BukkitItemStack
125 *
126 * @author creatorfromhell
127 * @since 0.2.0.0
128 */
129public class BukkitItemStack implements AbstractItemStack<ItemStack> {
130
131  private final Map<String, SerialComponent<AbstractItemStack<ItemStack>, ItemStack>> components = new HashMap<>();
132
133  private final List<String> flags = new ArrayList<>();
134
135  private final PersistentDataHolder holder = new PersistentDataHolder();
136
137  private int slot = 0;
138  private String material;
139  private int amount;
140  private boolean debug = false;
141
142  //item providers
143  private String itemProvider = BukkitItemPlatform.PLATFORM.defaultProviderIdentifier();
144  private String providerItemID = material;
145
146  //our locale stack
147  private boolean dirty = false;
148  private ItemStack localeStack;
149
150  /**
151   * Creates a new item stack with the specified material and amount.
152   *
153   * @param material The material of the item.
154   * @param amount   The number of items in the stack.
155   *
156   * @return A new item stack instance.
157   */
158  @Override
159  public BukkitItemStack of(final String material, final int amount) {
160
161    this.material = material;
162    this.amount = amount;
163    this.dirty = true;
164    return this;
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Creates a new item stack from a locale-specific object.
169   *
170   * @param locale The locale-specific representation.
171   *
172   * @return A new item stack instance.
173   */
174  @Override
175  public BukkitItemStack of(final ItemStack locale) {
176
177    this.localeStack = locale;
178    final NamespacedKey key = locale.getType().getKeyOrNull();
179    if(key != null) {
180      this.material = key.toString();
181    }
182
183    this.amount = locale.getAmount();
184    final ItemMeta meta = locale.getItemMeta();
185    if(meta != null) {
186      for(final ItemFlag flag : meta.getItemFlags()) {
187
188        this.flags.add(flag.name());
189      }
190    }
191
192    return BukkitItemPlatform.PLATFORM.serializer(this.localeStack, this);
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Creates a new item stack from a JSON representation.
197   *
198   * @param json The JSON object containing item stack data.
199   *
200   * @return A new item stack instance.
201   *
202   * @throws ParseException If the JSON structure is invalid.
203   */
204  @Override
205  public BukkitItemStack of(final JSONObject json) throws ParseException {
206
207
208    return this;
209  }
210
211  /**
212   * Sets the item flags.
213   *
214   * @param flags A list of flags to apply to the item.
215   *
216   * @return The updated item stack instance.
217   */
218  @Override
219  public BukkitItemStack flags(final List<String> flags) {
220
221    this.flags.addAll(flags);
222    this.dirty = true;
223    return this;
224  }
225
226  /**
227   * Sets the lore (descriptive text) of the item stack.
228   *
229   * @param lore A list of components representing the lore.
230   *
231   * @return The updated item stack instance.
232   */
233  @Override
234  public BukkitItemStack loreComponent(final List<Component> lore) {
235
236    applyComponent(new BukkitLoreComponent(lore));
237
238    return this;
239  }
240
241  /**
242   * Adds an enchantment to the item stack.
243   *
244   * @param enchantment The enchantment name.
245   * @param level       The level of the enchantment.
246   *
247   * @return The updated item stack instance.
248   */
249  @Override
250  public BukkitItemStack enchant(final String enchantment, final int level) {
251
252    applyComponent(new BukkitEnchantmentsComponent(new HashMap<>(){{
253      put(enchantment, level);
254    }}));
255    return this;
256  }
257
258  /**
259   * Adds multiple enchantments to the item stack.
260   *
261   * @param enchantments A map of enchantment names and levels.
262   *
263   * @return The updated item stack instance.
264   */
265  @Override
266  public BukkitItemStack enchant(final Map<String, Integer> enchantments) {
267
268    applyComponent(new BukkitEnchantmentsComponent(enchantments));
269    return this;
270  }
271
272  /**
273   * Adds enchantments to the item stack by name.
274   *
275   * @param enchantments A list of enchantment names.
276   *
277   * @return The updated item stack instance.
278   */
279  @Override
280  public BukkitItemStack enchant(final List<String> enchantments) {
281
282    final Map<String, Integer> enchants = new HashMap<>();
283    for(final String enchantment : enchantments) {
284      enchants.put(enchantment, 1);
285    }
286    applyComponent(new BukkitEnchantmentsComponent(enchants));
287    return this;
288  }
289
290  /**
291   * Returns the material of the item stack.
292   *
293   * @return The material of the item stack.
294   */
295  @Override
296  public String material() {
297
298    return material;
299  }
300
301  /**
302   * Sets the material of the item stack.
303   *
304   * @param material The material name.
305   *
306   * @return The updated item stack instance.
307   */
308  @Override
309  public BukkitItemStack material(final String material) {
310
311    this.material = material;
312    this.dirty = true;
313    return this;
314  }
315
316  /**
317   * The quantity of the item stack.
318   *
319   * @return the quantity of the item stack.
320   */
321  @Override
322  public int amount() {
323
324    return amount;
325  }
326
327  /**
328   * Sets the quantity of the item stack.
329   *
330   * @param amount The number of items in the stack.
331   *
332   * @return The updated item stack instance.
333   */
334  @Override
335  public BukkitItemStack amount(final int amount) {
336
337    this.amount = amount;
338    this.dirty = true;
339    return this;
340  }
341
342  /**
343   * Represents the inventory slot of the item stack.
344   *
345   * @return the inventory slot of the item stack.
346   */
347  @Override
348  public int slot() {
349
350    return slot;
351  }
352
353  /**
354   * Sets the inventory slot of the item stack.
355   *
356   * @param slot The slot index.
357   *
358   * @return The updated item stack instance.
359   */
360  @Override
361  public BukkitItemStack slot(final int slot) {
362
363    this.slot = slot;
364    this.dirty = true;
365    return this;
366  }
367
368  /**
369   * Enables or disables debug mode for the item stack.
370   *
371   * @param debug True to enable, false to disable.
372   *
373   * @return The updated item stack instance.
374   */
375  @Override
376  public BukkitItemStack debug(final boolean debug) {
377
378    this.debug = debug;
379    return this;
380  }
381
382  public ItemStack cacheLocale() {
383
384    return this.localeStack;
385  }
386
387  public void updateCache(final ItemStack localeStack) {
388
389    this.localeStack = localeStack;
390  }
391
392  /**
393   * Replaces the persistent data holder for the item stack.
394   *
395   * @param newHolder  The new persistent data holder.
396   * @param replaceOld True to replace existing data, false to merge.
397   *
398   * @return The updated item stack instance.
399   *
400   * @since 0.2.0.0
401   */
402  @Override
403  public BukkitItemStack applyPersistentHolder(final PersistentDataHolder newHolder, final boolean replaceOld) {
404
405    if(replaceOld) {
406      this.holder.getData().clear();
407    }
408
409    this.holder.getData().putAll(newHolder.getData());
410    this.dirty = true;
411    return this;
412  }
413
414  /**
415   * Retrieves the item flags.
416   *
417   * @return A list of flags applied to the item.
418   */
419  @Override
420  public List<String> flags() {
421
422    return this.flags;
423  }
424
425  /**
426   * Retrieves the components applied to the item stack.
427   *
428   * @return A map of component types and their serialized representations.
429   *
430   * @since 0.2.0.0
431   */
432  @Override
433  public Map<String, SerialComponent<AbstractItemStack<ItemStack>, ItemStack>> components() {
434
435    return components;
436  }
437
438  /**
439   * Retrieves the persistent data holder for the item stack.
440   *
441   * @return The persistent data holder.
442   *
443   * @since 0.2.0.0
444   */
445  @Override
446  public PersistentDataHolder persistentHolder() {
447
448    return holder;
449  }
450
451  /**
452   * Resets the dirty flag, indicating that the object's state has been synchronized with the
453   * database.
454   */
455  @Override
456  public void resetDirty() {
457    this.dirty = false;
458  }
459
460  /**
461   * Marks the item stack as dirty, indicating changes have been made.
462   */
463  @Override
464  public void markDirty() {
465
466    this.dirty = true;
467  }
468
469  /**
470   * Checks whether the object is dirty or has unsaved changes.
471   *
472   * @return true if the object is dirty, false otherwise
473   */
474  @Override
475  public boolean isDirty() {
476
477    return this.dirty;
478  }
479
480  /**
481   * This method returns a String representing the item provider.
482   *
483   * @return the item provider as a String
484   *
485   * @see ItemProvider
486   */
487  @Override
488  public String itemProvider() {
489
490    return this.itemProvider;
491  }
492
493  /**
494   * Sets the item provider to be used for retrieving items.
495   *
496   * @param itemProvider the string representing the item provider to be set
497   */
498  @Override
499  public void setItemProvider(final String itemProvider) {
500    this.itemProvider = itemProvider;
501    this.dirty = true;
502  }
503
504  /**
505   * Retrieves the provider item ID associated with the current object.
506   *
507   * @return The provider item ID of the object.
508   */
509  @Override
510  public String providerItemID() {
511
512    return this.providerItemID;
513  }
514
515  /**
516   * Sets the provider's item ID for the current item.
517   *
518   * @param providerItemID the unique ID assigned by the provider for the item
519   */
520  @Override
521  public void setProviderItemID(final String providerItemID) {
522
523    this.providerItemID = providerItemID;
524    this.dirty = true;
525  }
526
527  /**
528   * This method is used to return an ItemProvider object.
529   *
530   * @return ItemProvider object representing the item provider.
531   */
532  @Override
533  public ItemProvider<ItemStack> provider() {
534
535    return BukkitItemPlatform.PLATFORM.provider(itemProvider);
536  }
537
538  /**
539   * Converts the object to a JSONObject representation.
540   *
541   * @return A JSONObject representing the object data.
542   */
543  @Override
544  public JSONObject toJSON() {
545
546    return null;
547  }
548
549  /**
550   * Updates the attribute modifiers of the item stack.
551   *
552   * @param modifiers     a list of attribute modifiers
553   * @param showInTooltip whether to display the modifiers in the tooltip
554   *
555   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
556   *
557   * @see AttributeModifiersComponent
558   * @since 0.2.0.0
559   */
560  @Override
561  public BukkitItemStack attributeModifiers(final List<AttributeModifier> modifiers, final boolean showInTooltip) {
562
563    return this;
564  }
565
566  /**
567   * Updates the banner patterns of the item stack.
568   *
569   * @param patterns a list of pattern data
570   *
571   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
572   *
573   * @see BannerPatternsComponent
574   * @since 0.2.0.0
575   */
576  @Override
577  public BukkitItemStack bannerPatterns(final List<PatternData> patterns) {
578
579    return this;
580  }
581
582  /**
583   * Updates the base color of the item stack.
584   *
585   * @param color the new base color
586   *
587   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
588   *
589   * @see BaseColorComponent
590   * @since 0.2.0.0
591   */
592  @Override
593  public BukkitItemStack baseColor(final String color) {
594
595    return this;
596  }
597
598  /**
599   * Blocks attacks with the specified damage type using this item.
600   *
601   * @param damage the type of damage to block attacks from
602   *
603   * @return an AbstractItemStack object representing the item after blocking attacks
604   *
605   * @see BlocksAttacksComponent
606   * @since 0.2.0.0
607   */
608  @Override
609  public AbstractItemStack<ItemStack> blocksAttacks(final ItemDamage damage) {
610
611    return this;
612  }
613
614  /**
615   * Set the break sound for this item stack.
616   *
617   * @param sound the sound to be played when the item is broken
618   *
619   * @return the updated item stack object
620   *
621   * @see BreakSoundComponent
622   * @since 0.2.0.0
623   */
624  @Override
625  public AbstractItemStack<ItemStack> breakSound(final String sound) {
626
627    return this;
628  }
629
630  /**
631   * Updates the bucket entity data of the item stack.
632   *
633   * @param noAI             whether the entity has AI disabled
634   * @param silent           whether the entity is silent
635   * @param noGravity        whether the entity is affected by gravity
636   * @param glowing          whether the entity is glowing
637   * @param invulnerable     whether the entity is invulnerable
638   * @param health           the health of the entity
639   * @param age              the age of the entity
640   * @param variant          the variant of the entity
641   * @param huntingCooldown  the hunting cooldown of the entity
642   * @param bucketVariantTag the variant tag of the bucket
643   * @param type             the type of the entity
644   *
645   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
646   *
647   * @see BucketEntityDataComponent
648   * @since 0.2.0.0
649   */
650  @Override
651  public BukkitItemStack bucketEntityData(final boolean noAI, final boolean silent, final boolean noGravity, final boolean glowing, final boolean invulnerable, final float health, final int age, final int variant, final long huntingCooldown, final int bucketVariantTag, final String type) {
652
653    return this;
654  }
655
656  /**
657   * Bundles a collection of {@link AbstractItemStack} instances into a single collection.
658   *
659   * @param items A {@link Map} containing integer keys and {@link AbstractItemStack} values to be
660   *              bundled.
661   *
662   * @return An {@link AbstractItemStack} instance that represents the bundled items.
663   *
664   * @see BundleComponent
665   * @since 0.2.0.0
666   */
667  @Override
668  public BukkitItemStack bundle(final Map<Integer, AbstractItemStack<ItemStack>> items) {
669
670    applyComponent(new BukkitBundleComponent(items));
671    this.dirty = true;
672    return this;
673  }
674
675  /**
676   * Updates the blocks that the item stack can break.
677   *
678   * @param predicates a list of block predicates
679   *
680   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
681   *
682   * @see CanBreakComponent
683   * @since 0.2.0.0
684   */
685  @Override
686  public BukkitItemStack canBreak(final List<BlockPredicate> predicates) {
687
688    return this;
689  }
690
691  /**
692   * Updates the blocks that the item stack can be placed on.
693   *
694   * @param predicates a list of block predicates
695   *
696   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
697   *
698   * @see CanPlaceOnComponent
699   * @since 0.2.0.0
700   */
701  @Override
702  public BukkitItemStack canPlaceOn(final List<BlockPredicate> predicates) {
703
704    return this;
705  }
706
707  /**
708   * Updates the consumable properties of the item stack.
709   *
710   * @param consumeSeconds      the time it takes to consume the item
711   * @param animation           the animation to display when consuming
712   * @param sound               the sound to play when consuming
713   * @param hasConsumeParticles whether to show consume particles
714   * @param effects             a list of effects applied on consumption
715   *
716   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
717   *
718   * @see ConsumableComponent
719   * @since 0.2.0.0
720   */
721  @Override
722  public BukkitItemStack consumable(final float consumeSeconds, final String animation, final String sound, final boolean hasConsumeParticles, final List<ComponentEffect> effects) {
723
724    return this;
725  }
726
727  /**
728   * Constructs a container with the given map of items.
729   *
730   * @param items a map of items where the key is the position of the item in the container and the
731   *              value is the item
732   *
733   * @return an AbstractItemStack container with the specified items
734   *
735   * @see ContainerComponent
736   * @since 0.2.0.0
737   */
738  @Override
739  public BukkitItemStack container(final Map<Integer, AbstractItemStack<ItemStack>> items) {
740
741    applyComponent(new BukkitContainerComponent(items));
742    this.dirty = true;
743    return this;
744  }
745
746  /**
747   * Updates the custom name of the item stack.
748   *
749   * @param customName the custom name to set
750   *
751   * @return the updated BukkitItemStack instance
752   *
753   * @see CustomNameComponent
754   * @since 0.2.0.0
755   */
756  @Override
757  public BukkitItemStack customName(final Component customName) {
758
759    applyComponent(new BukkitCustomNameComponent(customName));
760    this.dirty = true;
761    return this;
762  }

764  /**

773   */
774  @Override
775  public BukkitItemStack damage(final int damage) {
776

778    this.dirty = true;
779    return this;
780  }

900   * Equips an item with specified parameters.
901   *

905   * @param slot            the slot in which the item should be equipped
906   * @param damageOnHurt    flag indicating if damage should be taken on hurt
907   * @param dispensable     flag indicating if the item is dispensable
908   * @param swappable       flag indicating if the item is swappable
909   * @param equipOnInteract flag indicating if the item should be equipped on interact
910   * @param entities        a list of entities to be equipped
911   *
912   * @return an BukkitItemStack object representing the equipped item
913   *
914   * @see EquipComponent
915   * @since 0.2.0.0
916   */
